sect1.title: From v1.0 to v2.x
sect1.para:
The following list shows the steps that are needed to migrate from PerfCake version 1.0 to 2.x:
Rename scenario XML schema namespace
Rename message number constant name
The following sections describe each step in detail.

simplesect.title: Rename XML schema namespace
simplesect.para: The namespace of the XML schema for scenarios has been renamed from urn:perfcake:scenario:1.0 to urn:perfcake:scenario:2.0 so it must be updated in the scenario XML files.

simplesect.title: Rename Message Number Constant Name
simplesect.para: If your sender depends on message ordinal number you need to change the name of the particular constant from PerfCakeConst.MESSAGE_NUMBER_PROPERTY to PerfCakeConst.MESSAGE_NUMBER_HEADER
